A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The hero's luck at work sure is distracting\, but everything else is just so majestic\, beautifully shot\, beautifully and smartly written that you'll more than forgive it. The amount of emotion is more than enough to moisten your eyelids more than a few times. The detail\, nuances and thoughtfulness added to each scene makes each minute of the movie all the more breathtaking\, sparking that child-like wonder within you. After the movie I went home gazing up at the night sky.   - and did I mention this movie was really funny as well?
